info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 7 at 12:43PM CDT until August 8 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening.
* IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins, mainly upstream of the gauge. At 10.0 feet, Significant amounts of pasture land are flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 PM CDT Thursday was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Friday evening at 700 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING
